class_libraries.library:
<class name="katana_trajectory_filter/KatanaTrajectoryFilterFilterJointTrajectory" type="katana_trajectory_filter::KatanaTrajectoryFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Reduces the number of segments in a trajectory to at most 16 (the maximum supported by the Katana arm).
<class name="katana_trajectory_filter/KatanaTrajectoryFilterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="katana_trajectory_filter::KatanaTrajectoryFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Reduces the number of segments in a trajectory to at most 16 (the maximum supported by the Katana arm).
